title: The Killer Interview with Piers Morgan
overview: Piers Morgan interviews some of the most infamous murderers in the U.S. Featuring some of the nation's most fiercely contested cases, exclusive interviews, and sensational revelations, these convicted killers all have one thing in common; they insist they are innocent. In a close-quarters, one hour interview, this is the murderer's chance to give their side of the story.
